Checking how to reconcile kallisto file names and the excel key file

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

get the kallisto-generated file names.  These correspond to the file names from the sequencer.

```{r}
files <- dir(path = "../Kallisto_output/", include.dirs = TRUE)
kallisto_q <- str_extract(files, pattern = "q_[0-9]{3}") %>% 
  str_replace("q", "Q") %>% #to match excel sheet
  str_replace("_(0){1,2}", "_") %>% # remove leading 0s to match excel sheet
  sort()

kallisto_q
```

read the key in
```{r}
key <- readxl::read_excel("../tube_no_legend_time_course_2018.xlsx")

key
```

Does the q_# in kallisto correspond to tube #?
```{r}
tube_no <- key %>% pull(tube_no) %>% 
  str_remove("_D8") #No "D8" in kallisto names

kallisto_q[! kallisto_q %in% tube_no]

tube_no[! tube_no %in% kallisto_q]
```
yes, all kallisto q #s are found in tube no, and alomst all tube #s are found in kallisto

what about pot#
```{r}
kallisto_q[! kallisto_q %in% key$pot]
```
no, not a good match
